ai-ja400:2.4_0: and stays safeguarding from the phoenixes.
ai-ja400:3.3_0: The floods I used to be so pretty,
ai-ja400:4.1_0: I used to be in the past
ai-ja400:4.2_0: for many folk are very helpful to me.
ai-ja400:4.3_0: I’ve stopped all deeds of my body,
ai-ja400:4.4_0: this is reckoned as a dispute.

ai-ja400:6.2_0: If he does not speak of,
ai-ja400:7.2_0: as aristocrat, will gain the throne.
ai-ja400:7.4_0: seeing the face of the mouth.
ai-ja400:8.1_0: What is the stain of stinginess?
ai-ja400:9.3_0: Don’t attack disputes with a dispute;
